channel.title: Animation/Design - A blog about animation and design
channel.description: A blog about my favorite animation.

item.title: Animation Research
item.description: I have been doing alot more lately to find out more about animation and fine tune my skills with the software i currently use.

item.title: Treehouse Meetups
item.description: This is a post about all the awesome treehouse meetups out there!

item.title: Converge
item.description: Animation is amazing in my eyes and what ive seen some people acheieve in a couple of hours is amazing.

item.title: Animation Image
item.description:
This is a a project that i have just started

This is a animation I am designing in Maya, and this is a test image I took in the early stages of making the scene and before i have started animating or rendering anything.

item.title: My Experience with Animation
item.description:
Animation is something that I have only recently tried but it is a great thing if anyone can take the time to learn it.

I will have its struggles when you attempt to make your first project with the software going crazy on you. If you can power through that though, you will be on your way to becoming a great animator
